Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Malibu in 1965...
Injured on 8/31/1967 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1968, off Michael Ferrante (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/21/1968, off Bill Benson (NE)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1969...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1970...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1972, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1972, hitting .341 with 10 HR, 24 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1973, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Manchester on 6/20/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1973, hitting .552 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1974, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Manchester on 4/30/1978...
Signed as a free agent by Coney Island on 2/17/1979 to a 1-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Ashburn on 2/2/1980 to a 4-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1980, hitting .361 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1980, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/19/1981, off Lino Godsey (HAL)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Gashouse on 4/15/1983...
